pkgmetadata.longdescription: Ecological Trajectory Analysis // Assists ecologists in the analysis of temporal changes of ecosystems, defined as trajectories on a chosen multivariate space, by providing a set of trajectory metrics and visual representations (see De Caceres et al. (2019) doi:10.1002/ecm.1350 and Sturbois et al. (2021) doi:10.1016/j.ecolmodel.2020.109400). Includes functions to estimate metrics for individual trajectories (length, directionality, angles, ...) as well as metrics to relate pairs of trajectories (dissimilarity and convergence).
